mapper.select: SELECT review_no , review_title , review_contents , review_date , goods_no , crew_id , review_liked , review_img , crew_no , order_no FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn , review_no , review_title , review_contents , TO_CHAR(review_date , 'YYYY.MM.DD') review_date , goods_no , crew_id , review_liked , review_img , crew_no , order_no FROM(SELECT review_no , review_title , review_contents , review_date , goods_no , crew_id , review_liked , review_img , crew_no , order_no FROM review_board WHERE crew_no = #{crew_no} ORDER BY review_date desc) WHERE ROWNUM <=#{endNo} ) WHERE RN >=#{startNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_board (review_no , review_title , review_contents , review_date , goods_no , review_liked , review_img , crew_no , order_no ) VALUES ( review_no_seq.nextval , #{review_title} , #{review_contents} , sysdate , #{goods_no} , 0 , #{review_img} , #{crew_no}, #{order_no})
